query:
On another thread we had configured full logging to capture everything we could for training purposes, the task to keep everything local was an oversight that needs to be adjusted, we want to collect everything we can.
Also I noticed the following in the build log:
=== ML Data Collection Progress ===

      chats: 422/200

      commits: 0/2000

============================================================

============================================================

============================================================

📈 Target Data Points:
   Commits:  5,000

💾 Estimated Sizes:
   Commits data:  23.8 MB

   Actions data:  23.8 MB
   ─────────────────────────
   TOTAL:         72.3 MB

🧠 Model Training Estimates:
   Vocabulary size:     ~15,000 tokens (this project)
   Training examples:   ~10,000
   Micro-model size:    1-10 MB (1-10M parameters)
   Training time:       ~1-4 hours (single GPU)
   Inference:           <100ms on CPU

⏱️  Time to Collection Complete:
   At current rate:     ~305 days (10 months)
   With active use:     ~152 days (more chatting)

============================================================
Why are we not collecting this data, investigate git history and inform me of what I'm missing.
After you've done that please remind me about remaining tasks.
Thanks!
What are your thoughts?
response: Let me investigate the ML data collection issue and understand why we're seeing zeros.
